biotools.summary: Make the analysis of Next-Generation Sequencing data simple. Depending on your background and interest, it offers various modes with optimised settings: Clinical (HPO), Clinical (Gene Panels), Gene Function and Basic Search.

bioschemas.name: MutationDistiller
